greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum_{d|n, d=1 or 6 mod 7} d.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Sum[If[Mod[d, 7] == 1 || Mod[d, 7]==6, d, 0], {d, Divisors[n]}], {n, 80}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 21 2017 *)
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 80, print1(sumdiv(n, d, if(d%7==1 || d%7==6, d, 0)), ", ")) \\ _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 21 2017
def a(n): return sum([d for d in divisors(n) if d%7==1 or d%7 == 6]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 21 2017
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 21 2017
